value:
I am an important person in House
Pherae. The family's head himself
chose me as his seneschal, after all!

Can you credit it that the princess of
Bern was shut up in the cellar of a
castle in the middle of nowhere?$k$pEven I, with all of my years of
experience, could not have
foreseen such a thing!

Pushing yourself like this is simply
unacceptable. I won't allow it! The
night is a time of rest.

I was a merchant, but Lord Roy's
father rescued me, you see. Thanks
to that, I came to serve his house.

♪ Hmm, hmm, hmm... ♪ Hmm. I
may not be as boisterous as I used to
be. I must project dignity at all times!

I am here on behalf of the esteemed
$Nf.

I know, I know... Luck such as this is
fleeting. Perhaps I should withdraw
while things are going well!

Do I have talent for fighting? Dear
me, no. I favor a hasty retreat!

Oh, no. No, no, no. Fighting pointless
battle after battle is no strategy!

I see! You would have me make use
of this treasure. I gladly accept!

I am Merlinus, seneschal to House
Pherae. I may not be a warrior, but I
have knowledge and courage aplenty!

Commander Anna, was it? She struck
me as a tad flighty, but in truth she
has the situation well in hand!$k$pI must say that her invitation to share
drinks after the end of the fighting
was unexpected—and quite gracious!$k$pSpeaking of being in control, you're
doing a fine job, aren't you? I'm
reminded of Lord Eliwood...$k$pThat power of yours could generate
a tidy profit, I say! Not for me, no,
but for all to share in.$k$pWe're much the same, aren't we?
Strong convictions and a thirst for
justice! Ha-ha!
ほりゃあっ
やりますぞ！
ぎゃあっ
なんじゃと！？
You're a tough customer.
No touching!
Prepare for the worst!
I'll make you pay!
I'm getting out of here!
むむ…
I am Merlinus, a humble servant of my lord Eliwood, Marquess Pherae.
Hyaaaa! You nearly gave me a heart attack. Have some respect for your elders, you rascal!
*sigh* I know nothing of combat! How did I end up in this mess?
Do not overlook the importance of merchants. Without us, there could be no battle!
I dreamt of working for a noble house for so long...and I saw my dream come true!
What a joy it is, seeing my Lord Roy grow into such a fine young man.
You are not a noble but...bah, it matters not. You are worthy of my services, and my services you shall receive!
Yes, of course.
Wait a moment!
Musn't be layabouts.
